newsitem.title: USA: Advanced Optics to merge with firm.
newsitem.headline: Advanced Optics to merge with firm.

text.p: Advanced Optics Electronics Inc said on Tuesday that it had signed a letter of intent to merge with a privately-held technology firm for a transfer of about 6.4 million common shares.

Advanced Optics did not name the firm, referring to it only as a space and information technology company, but estimated that the company would generate revenues of at least $8 million a year over the next five years.
Advanced Optics said it expected to complete the deal in August.

"This acquisition will enable us to advance our product capabilities and technical expertise in addition to increasing our 1997 consolidated revenues to an estimated $9 million," Advanced Optics said in a statement.
